name: Through Innocent Eyes
description:
Through Innocent Eyes is an evasian-based adventure  game about finding out what happened to your mother. The game combines an ability-system with narrative inspired by todays spirit of the age.

Don´t catch the virus while you are outside! Evade the adults or they will send you home! Interact with different objects to advance the story, hide behind your hands to become invisible, but be coatious, as you will be blind for the time being!

You are a little child not understanding what is going on in the world right. All you know is, that you are not allowed outside and that you mother is missing since a few weeks.  Bravely, you decide to go out into this new unknown world on the search for your mother. Your only weapon being your imagination.  Or will you..?
